metadata.description: Swing trading strategy with seed algorithms and variants for 3-10 day positions
metadata.author: Algorithm Discovery System

current_algorithm.name: Advanced Swing Momentum
current_algorithm.description: Advanced swing algorithm with breakout patterns and momentum confirmation

v1.0.name: Basic Breakout Pattern
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.5 and latest close > 1 day ago high and latest close > 50 ) )

v1.1.name: Multi-Timeframe Breakout
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and  latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.8 and latest close > 5 days ago max( 5 , latest high ) and latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest rsi( 14 ) > 45 ) )

v1.2.name: Volume Confirmed Breakout
v1.2.description: Strong breakout with institutional volume patterns
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 2.0 and latest close / 10 days ago close > 1.05 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 50 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 75 and market cap > 500 ) )

v1.0.name: Basic Price Momentum
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 10 ) and latest sma ( latest close , 10 ) > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 10 ) * 1.2 and latest close > 50 ) )

v1.1.name: RSI Momentum Combo
v1.1.description: Momentum with RSI oversold to overbought transition
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma( latest close , 20 ) and latest rsi( 14 ) > 50 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 70 and 3 days ago rsi( 14 ) < 45 and latest volume > latest sma( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.3 ) )

v1.2.name: Acceleration Momentum
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest close / 3 days ago close > 1.03 and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.5 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 55 and latest close > latest ema ( latest close , 21 ) ) )

v1.0.name: Support Bounce
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) * 0.98 and latest close < latest sma ( latest close , 50 ) * 1.02 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 40 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 60 and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.2 ) )

v1.1.name: Flag Pattern
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and 1 day ago close / 5 days ago close > 1.05 and latest close / 1 day ago close > 0.98 and latest close / 1 day ago close < 1.02 and latest volume < 3 days ago volume and latest rsi( 14 ) > 45 ) )

v1.2.name: Cup and Handle
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > 20 days ago high and latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 20 ) and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.6 and 10 days ago close < 15 days ago close and latest rsi( 14 ) > 55 ) )

v1.0.name: Basic Reversal
v1.0.query: ( {cash} ( latest rsi( 14 ) < 35 and 1 day ago rsi( 14 ) < latest rsi( 14 ) and latest close > latest open and latest volume > ( latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.3 ) ) )

v1.1.name: Hammer Reversal
v1.1.query: ( {cash} ( latest low < 3 days ago low and latest close > latest open and latest close > ( latest high + latest low ) / 2 and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.4 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 40 ) )

v1.2.name: Double Bottom Reversal
v1.2.description: Double bottom pattern with volume confirmation
v1.2.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma ( latest close , 10 ) and 5 days ago low < 10 days ago low and latest low > 5 days ago low and latest volume > latest sma ( latest volume , 20 ) * 1.5 and latest rsi( 14 ) > 45 ) )

v1.0.0.name: Basic Swing Patterns
v1.0.0.description: Initial swing algorithm with basic patterns

v1.1.0.name: Enhanced Swing Detection
v1.1.0.description: Enhanced algorithm with improved pattern recognition

v1.2.0.name: Advanced Pattern Recognition
v1.2.0.description: Advanced algorithm with sophisticated pattern analysis

v1.3.0.name: Experimental High-Performance Swing
v1.3.0.description: Experimental version with latest pattern variants for swing trading
